name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P4.5 Frame Pack
description:
Add extra storage without sacrificing your water bottles. Re-purposed fabric helps reduce waste in our waterways. Water-resistant construction keeps contents dry in most rainstorms. Easy on-off design is a breeze to use when coming and going.Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets.Water-resistant stiching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry.Daisy chain and 6 Velcro® straps secure bag to bike frame.Dual-side zippered access helps keep you organized.Soft-lined phone pocket with keychain clip.Reflective elements ensure you stay visible in questionable weather

        Sustainability
